articles.title: Video shows Highland Park, Illinois, parade shooting suspect being taken into custody - CNN Video
articles.description: Robert E. Crimo III, identified by police as the person suspected of shooting and killing six people and wounding dozens of others Monday morning at a Fourth of July parade in Highland Park, Illinois, has been arrested, authorities said. CNN's Josh Campbell h…

articles.author: Steve Contorno, CNN
articles.title: Ron DeSantis has raised more than $100 million for his reelection bid. Could he use that money in a presidential race?
articles.description: Few people noticed when the Federal Election Commission deadlocked last month over whether US Rep. Byron Donalds of Florida in 2020 had broken a law intended to keep money raised for a state campaign out of federal elections.

articles.author: Helen Regan and Adrienne Broaddus, CNN
articles.title: July Fourth celebrations in Highland Park, Illinois, end in terror after mass shooting leaves 6 dead and dozens injured
articles.description: A day of national celebration turned to tragedy Monday when a gunman killed six people and injured dozens of others at a July Fourth parade in Highland Park, Illinois -- leaving the nation grieving yet another mass shooting.
articles.content: Highland Park, Illinois (CNN)A day of national celebration turned to tragedy Monday when a gunman killed six people and injured dozens of others at a July Fourth parade in Highland Park, Illinois -- … [+6865 chars]

articles.author: By Travis Caldwell and Kelly McCleary, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Highland Park shooting at July 4 parade in Illinois
articles.description: A suspect is in custody, police say, after at least six people were killed in a shooting in downtown Highland Park, Illinois, in the area of a July Fourth parade. Follow here for the latest live news updates.
articles.content:
Suspected gunman Robert Bobby Crimo III posted online music videos he apparently made that featured ominous sounding lyrics and animated scenes of gun violence.

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: July 4 parade slaughter again shows nowhere is safe from America's mass killing contagion
articles.description: America's latest mass shooting turned a cherished July Fourth parade from a scene of patriotic joy into one of fear and death.

articles.title: Video shows the moment shots fired during Highland Park parade - CNN Video
articles.description: A video shows the moment shots were fired into a Fourth of July parade in Highland Park, Illinois, which resulted in dozens injured and at least six dead.

articles.author: Megan Thomas
articles.title: Rachel Brosnahan 'sick' over shooting in her hometown of Highland Park
articles.description: Actress Rachel Brosnahan is expressing her grief over the mass shooting in Highland Park, Illinois on Monday that has left at least six people dead and dozens more injured.

articles.author: Opinion by Jens Ludwig
articles.title: Opinion: The surprising solution to gun violence
articles.description: New insights from behavioral science suggest there's more to situations than root causes like poverty or segregation and help us see progress on the gun violence crisis is much more possible than we've thought, writes Jens Ludwig.
